summary: This document is an email chain from November 2019 discussing allegations from a New York Times article and other sources. It details a victim's account of inappropriate touching by Jeffrey Epstein during a movie outing and lists a series of alleged abusive incidents involving Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as initiating inappropriate physical contact with a victim during a movie, and is the central figure in a list of alleged abusive incidents.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in connection with alleged incidents including giving a nude massage and being present during abusive events with Epstein.

persons.name: Mike Baker
persons.context: Name appears in the email chain, but the provided text does not specify their role or connection to the events.

connections.description: Both are implicated together in multiple alleged incidents of abuse against the victim, including coordinated touching and Maxwell giving massages.
Epstein is alleged to have rubbed the victim's hand and leg in a movie theater, climbed into bed with her, and engaged in other inappropriate touching.
Maxwell is alleged to have given the victim a nude massage and was present with Epstein during abusive incidents.

events.title: Movie Theater Incident in NYC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein rubbed a victim's hand and lower leg during a movie ("12 Monkeys") in a New York City theater.

events.title: Series of Alleged Abusive Incidents
events.description: A list of allegations includes foot massages in NM with Maxwell, more movie theater touching in NM, Epstein climbing into bed for spooning, Maxwell giving a nude massage, and the victim fearing rape and running away.

keyFacts: A victim alleges Jeffrey Epstein rubbed her hand and leg during a movie ("12 Monkeys") in a New York City theater.
A detailed list of allegations includes incidents in New Mexico involving foot massages, coordinated touching by Epstein and Maxwell, and Maxwell giving the victim a nude massage.
The victim reported being afraid of rape and running away from a situation with Epstein and Maxwell.
The document is an internal email chain from November 2019, showing discussion of victim allegations sourced from a New York Times article.
